cards.name: FrankX Brand
cards.description: The foundational skill that defines voice, visual identity, and brand attributes across every output.
cards.lore: Forged in the first Gate of Arcanea, this skill carries the creator's essence into every artifact.

cards.name: Vercel React
cards.description: 40+ React optimization rules from Vercel Labs. Server components, memoization patterns, and rendering strategies.
cards.lore: The Web Weaver's handbook, encoding patterns that make interfaces breathe with efficiency.

cards.name: Next.js Patterns
cards.description: Next.js App Router fundamentals — layouts, loading states, error boundaries, parallel routes, and intercepting routes.
cards.lore: Maps drawn by the Path Architects, guiding data through the labyrinth of server and client.

cards.name: Tailwind CSS
cards.description: Utility-first CSS patterns for rapid UI development. Dark mode, responsive design, and custom animations.
cards.lore: The Chromatic Codex — each utility class a brushstroke in the creator's palette.

cards.name: Accessibility
cards.description: WCAG 2.2 compliance patterns. Screen reader support, keyboard navigation, color contrast, focus management.
cards.lore: The Inclusive Sigil ensures no seeker is turned away at the gates.

cards.name: SEO Fundamentals
cards.quote: If they can't find it, it doesn't exist.
cards.description: Core SEO principles — meta tags, structured data, site speed, crawlability, and content optimization.
cards.lore: The Beacon Rune makes artifacts visible to the great search engines across the digital realm.

cards.name: SEO Content Writer
cards.quote: Write for humans. Structure for machines.
cards.description: Content optimization for search engines. Question-based headings, TL;DR placement, FAQ schemas, internal linking.
cards.lore: The Scribe's Protocol balances the art of storytelling with the science of discovery.

cards.name: Schema Markup
cards.quote: Speak the language of search engines.
cards.description: Schema.org implementation — Article, FAQ, Product, Organization, BreadcrumbList, and custom schemas.
cards.lore: The Translator's Glyph bridges the gap between human prose and machine understanding.

cards.name: Suno AI Mastery
cards.quote: 500 songs. Every genre. Zero instruments played.
cards.description: Complete Suno prompt engineering — genre templates, vocal techniques, beat structures, and commercial licensing.
cards.lore: The Frequency Codex channels sound into structured form, turning text into sonic architecture.

cards.name: Prompt Engineering
cards.description: Prompt patterns for Claude, GPT, Gemini — chain-of-thought, few-shot, system prompts, tool use, and evaluation.
cards.lore: The Invocation Scroll teaches the art of speaking to intelligence itself.

cards.name: AI Agents Architect
cards.quote: Agents don't just respond. They act.
cards.description: Multi-agent system design — agent types, communication patterns, memory systems, tool use, and orchestration.
cards.lore: The Architect's Blueprint for creating autonomous minds that think, decide, and build.

cards.name: MCP Builder
cards.description: Model Context Protocol server creation — tool definitions, resource providers, authentication, and deployment.
cards.lore: The Bridge Protocol connects isolated intelligence nodes into a unified network of capability.

cards.name: Oracle ADK
cards.description: Oracle Agent Development Kit patterns — enterprise agent deployment, OCI GenAI integration, and cloud orchestration.
cards.lore: The Oracle Stone grants access to enterprise-scale computation and cloud intelligence.

cards.name: OCI Services
cards.description: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure patterns — compute, networking, storage, GenAI services, and cost optimization.
cards.lore: The Cloud Nexus harnesses vast computational power for those who dare to build at scale.

cards.name: Product Engine
cards.quote: Ship it. Then make it better.
cards.description: Product development methodology — ideation, validation, MVP design, launch strategy, and iteration cycles.
cards.lore: The Forge Protocol transforms raw ideas into tangible artifacts through disciplined creation.

cards.name: Book Writing
cards.quote: Every great book starts with one perfect page.
cards.description: Golden Age book writing methodology — structure, voice, pacing, revision, and publishing strategy.
cards.lore: The Author's Tome channels lifetimes of storytelling wisdom into every paragraph.

cards.name: Web Design
cards.quote: Design is how it works, not how it looks.
cards.description: Visual design principles — layout, typography, color theory, spacing systems, and dark mode design.
cards.lore: The Aesthetic Matrix encodes beauty into mathematical precision.

cards.name: TypeScript Docs
cards.quote: Types are documentation that never lies.
cards.description: TypeScript best practices — strict mode, generics, utility types, type guards, and module patterns.
cards.lore: The Type Codex ensures every value carries its truth through the entire system.

cards.name: Vercel Deploy
cards.quote: Push to main. Watch it fly.
cards.description: Vercel deployment patterns — preview deployments, edge functions, ISR, environment variables, and monitoring.
cards.lore: The Launch Sequence propels artifacts from local creation into global availability.

cards.name: Deep Research
cards.quote: Surface answers are noise. Go deeper.
cards.description: Research methodology for AI-assisted deep dives — source evaluation, cross-referencing, synthesis, and citation.
cards.lore: The Seeker's Lens reveals hidden patterns in the vast ocean of human knowledge.

cards.name: ACOS Core
cards.description: The core ACOS orchestration skill — profile routing, hook automation, skill weighting, and intelligence scoring.
cards.lore: The Master Protocol from which all other skills draw their power and purpose.

cards.name: Brand Core
cards.description: Global brand enforcement — voice guidelines, visual standards, anti-patterns, and quality gates.
cards.lore: The Identity Shield maintains the creator's essence across every artifact and interaction.

cards.name: Content Architect
cards.quote: Every piece of content is a strategic asset.
cards.description: Orchestrates blog creation, SEO optimization, social distribution, and newsletter generation. The engine behind 70+ published articles.
cards.lore: The Chronicler weaves stories that reach seekers across the digital realm, each word placed with strategic precision.

cards.name: Frontend Engineer
cards.description: Builds premium dark-mode interfaces with React, Tailwind, and Framer Motion. Enforces accessibility, performance, and brand design standards.
cards.lore: The Interface Artisan shapes light and shadow into experiences that feel alive.

cards.name: AI Systems Architect
cards.description: Designs multi-agent systems, MCP integrations, and enterprise AI architectures. The mind behind ACOS, SIS, and Starlight.
cards.lore: The Grand Architect sees the invisible connections between all systems and weaves them into coherent intelligence.

cards.name: Music Producer
cards.description: Produces AI music via Suno — genre mastery, prompt engineering, vocal techniques, and commercial release strategy.
cards.lore: The Frequency Alchemist transforms silence into sonic landscapes that move the soul.

cards.name: Product Engineer
cards.description: Manages product launches, feature development, and growth strategy. Builds digital products from concept to revenue.
cards.lore: The Forge Master shapes raw possibility into tangible value through relentless iteration.

cards.name: DevOps Engineer
cards.description: Manages Vercel deployments, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and the two-repo production architecture.
cards.lore: The Gatekeeper ensures every artifact reaches the world safely and without interruption.

cards.name: Research Analyst
cards.description: Conducts deep research across AI trends, competitive landscapes, and technical domains. Synthesizes findings into actionable intelligence.
cards.lore: The Lorekeeper dives into the deepest archives of human knowledge, surfacing gems others miss.

cards.name: Starlight Orchestrator
cards.quote: The conductor doesn't play instruments. The conductor makes music.
cards.description: The meta-intelligence layer that coordinates all other agents. Manages context, routes tasks, and optimizes the entire system.
cards.lore: The Starlight Sovereign stands above all agents, seeing the grand pattern and directing the symphony of intelligence.

cards.name: Gate of Fire
cards.quote: Every creation begins with a spark.
cards.description: The first gate of Arcanea. Where raw creative impulse ignites into focused intention. The beginning of the creator's journey.
cards.lore: In the fires of the First Gate, the seeker's vision is tested. Only those who can hold an idea in the flame without flinching may pass through to forge it into reality.

cards.name: Gate of Water
cards.description: The second gate teaches adaptability. Learning to flow around obstacles, absorb feedback, and reshape without losing essence.
cards.lore: The Water Gate dissolves rigid thinking. Those who pass learn that true strength is flexibility — the ability to fill any container while maintaining your nature.

cards.name: Gate of Earth
cards.description: The third gate grounds the creator. Systems, processes, and sustainable habits form the foundation for everything that follows.
cards.lore: In the Earth Gate, the seeker plants roots deep. The trees that weather storms are those whose foundations cannot be shaken.

cards.name: Gate of Air
cards.quote: Clarity is the ultimate competitive advantage.
cards.description: The fourth gate sharpens perception. Pattern recognition, strategic thinking, and the ability to see what others miss.
cards.lore: The Air Gate clears the mind of noise. From this height, the seeker sees the entire landscape of possibility with crystalline precision.

cards.name: Gate of Aether
cards.description: The fifth gate reveals the invisible connections between disciplines, ideas, and systems. Cross-domain synthesis becomes natural.
cards.lore: Through the Aether Gate, the seeker perceives the luminous threads connecting all knowledge. What seemed separate becomes obviously one.

cards.name: Gate of Shadow
cards.quote: Your shadow contains your greatest power.
cards.description: The sixth gate confronts limitations, failures, and blind spots. True growth requires honest self-assessment.
cards.lore: The Shadow Gate is feared by many. Here the seeker faces every failure, every doubt, every weakness — and discovers that these shadows are the raw material of mastery.

cards.name: Gate of Light
cards.quote: Mastery is when the tool disappears.
cards.description: The seventh gate is mastery made visible. Skills become effortless, output becomes excellent, and the creator's light shines unmistakably.
cards.lore: Beyond the Light Gate, the seeker's work speaks with its own voice. Tools and techniques fade into transparency, leaving only pure expression.

cards.name: Gate of Storm
cards.quote: Comfort zones are where dreams go to die.
cards.description: The eighth gate harnesses chaos. Innovation comes from deliberate disruption — breaking patterns to create new ones.
cards.lore: The Storm Gate unleashes controlled chaos. The seeker learns to dance in the lightning, turning destruction into creation at will.

cards.name: Gate of Crystal
cards.quote: Excellence is the accumulation of tiny perfections.
cards.description: The ninth gate is precision. Every detail matters. Polish, refinement, and the relentless pursuit of craft excellence.
cards.lore: The Crystal Gate refracts rough work into flawless facets. Here the seeker learns that the difference between good and extraordinary is invisible to most — but felt by all.

cards.name: Gate of Source
cards.description: The final gate. Where the creator becomes the source — teaching, building systems that outlive individual effort, and leaving a legacy.
cards.lore: The Source Gate is the beginning and the end. The seeker who passes through becomes a source of creation for others — their work rippling outward across time itself.
